title: Integrated Information Technology Township (IITP) shall be allowed in Residential, Commercial, Public Semi-public, Industrial and Agricultural Zone in Development Plan and Regional Plan areas and shall be governed by the provisions mentioned herein below
clause_text: Integrated Information Technology Township (IITP) shall be allowed in Residential, Commercial, Public Semi-public, Industrial and Agricultural Zone in Development Plan and Regional Plan areas and shall be governed by the provisions mentioned herein below.
